title: How do I change my project's name?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • My Project's name is incorrect, misspelled, or just needs changing for other reasons.

sections.title: Cause
content: You have misspelled or simply wish to change your Project name.

sections.title: Resolution
content: 1. Go to the Account Settings homepage and log in.
3. Find the project you want to rename and click View.
5. Rename the project and then click the Rename button.
